item.description: EXFO - BV-10 Performance Endpoint Unit Undocumented privileged user. Unit has an undocumented hard-coded privileged user.

item.description: EXFO - BV-10 Performance Endpoint Unit authentication bypass User can manually manipulate access enabling authentication bypass.
